prompt: Design a map view page featuring a full-screen map. Include a transparent app bar with the title 'Map Explorer' in bold white text and a white back arrow icon. The app bar should overlay the map without a background color, blending seamlessly with the map content. Add a floating action button in the bottom-left corner with a red GPS icon (Colors.red) and a white background for high contrast. The map area should have a dark grey background (Colors.grey[800]) to simulate a night mode map. Ensure the layout adheres to Material Design with smooth transitions and a modern feel. Include a subtle shadow under the floating action button for depth.
